works.description:
Reproduces without my permission a review
 
I wrote on my blog at FragerFactor.blogspot.com, so when people search for
 
those phrases they get this article instead, which is by a competitor for 

the sole purpose of slandering the product and me personally. Statements  

are not supported by fact. Comments are by invented personas, probably one
 
or two personas including the author having  conversation with themselves 

to slander me. None of the people commenting have identities and track  
records on Google that would qualify them as subject matter experts. When 

people search Google for me Owen Frager, this article comes up in the to 4
 
positions, engineered to do so by baking my name into the content for the 

purpose of hijacking our customers to their competitive brand. Owner of
the  
blog has a record of domain name disputes, infringing on trademarks,  
especially celebrities and having their sites banned from Google because
of  
these tactics.
